ygData.subject: Re: Dark Elf SK
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to disagree that DE are the best SK. You have to remember we are 3/4 warrior 1/4 necro.  Now, at lower levels I would have to say that DE are even or
ygData.messageBody:
I have to disagree that DE are the best SK. You have to remember we are 3/4
warrior 1/4 necro. Now, at lower levels I would have to say that DE are even
or even better than Trolls and Ogres all the way up to around 22. But once you
get high enough str starts taking affect and the higher str equals more
damage. Our spells are just there to do extra damage while we go at it with
our swords. If you think other wise then you should of played a necro because
you are going to be disappointed. Now, I'm not saying that our spells
suck. I am one of the people who like SK the way they are and think that there
is nothing wrong with the class. I'm just saying that we do not realy on our
spells but they are just there to complement us. Plus whoever said about a
spectre hitting for 90 points that's not that big of a deal when you get higher
levels. With over 1000hp and full plate 90 points won't seem that high as it
does at lower levels.

-Nuluk

AmataiCy@... wrote:

> From: AmataiCy@...
>
> You guys are crazy. Dark elfs are probably the best SK. For over all reasons
> too. There stats are more balanced, they're int is higher, and eventually
> they'll pass up the ogre and troll in higher levels because of more powerful
> spells
>
> Amatai
